main.head: Italians vote in general election - video
main.p: This article is more than 12 years old

Voters go to the polls on the second and final day of voting in Italy's general election amid fears of a political stalemate. In a contest watched closely by the markets, the centre-left Democratic party led by Pier Luigi Bersani has been vying with the centre-right Freedom People party of former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi for the lion's share of the vote. Both are seen casting their votes, along with prime minister Mario Monti
